title: Professional Social Competency Enhancement Program Using Collaborative Instructional Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary Social Studies Knowledge and Experience with Digital Tools
context.additional_context: Social problem-solving competency enhancement program for career preparation in healthcare/legal/technical fields, establishing a collaborative learning environment that integrates theory and technology through a one-teach-one-tech strategy

learning_goals: Learners can write social issue analysis reports using collaborative classroom models.
Learners can communicate efficiently using technical tools in real-time video conferences.
Learners can exchange feedback through a peer assessment system during the project implementation process
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
